name: Blas-Tris-Be
description:
Prealpha (I like to say Alfalfa) of puzzle  game for GameBoy/GameBoyColor/SuperGameBoy based on BlastrisB from the Super Scope 6 cartridge of the SNES.

Rough WIP, so expect a lot of bugs, some options are just a mockup and don't work at all, but since I have temporarily put it aside, here it is if anyone wants to try it.
